    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Alghollthu Bound](/Feats.aspx?ID=2669) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Azarketi" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=336" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Absalom, City of Lost Omens](/Sources.aspx?ID=108) pg. 394, [Azarketi Ancestry Web Supplement](/Sources.aspx?ID=76) pg. 4</row>

</column>

---

Although you may not even be aware, the [alghollthus](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=1) your ancestors once served maintain a stranglehold on the deepest, tethered parts of your mind. You receive a +2 circumstance bonus to Will saves against [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106) effects that would make you [controlled](/Conditions.aspx?ID=6), and if you roll a success against such an effect, you get a critical success instead. However, you gain none of these benefits against effects originating from alghollthus and instead take a –2 circumstance penalty against mental effects from alghollthus.
name: Alghollthu Bound
